appShortName.description: The short_name (maximum of 12 characters recommended) is a short version of the app's name.

appDescription.message: Add notifications for Migrate Guru migrations

browserActionTitle.description: The title of the browser action button

notificationSuccessTitle.description: The title of the success notification

notificationSuccessMessage.description: The message of the success notification

notificationFailureTitle.description: The title of the failure notification

notificationFailureMessage.description: The message of the failure notification

popupHeader.description: The header text in the popup

popupSourceListItem.description: The secondary text in the source list item in the popup

popupDestinationListItem.description: The secondary text in the destination list item in the popup

popupStatusListItem.description: The secondary text in the status list item in the popup

popupNotificationListItem.description: The primary text in the notification list item in the popup

popupFaviconListItem.description: The primary text in the favicon list item in the popup

popupEnabledListItem.description: The secondary text of an enabled setting (notification/favicon) list item in the popup

popupDisabledListItem.description: The secondary text of a disabled setting (notification/favicon) list item in the popup

popupSourceButton.description: The button for opening the source site from the popup

popupDestinationButton.description: The button for opening the destination site from the popup

statusNotStarted.description: The status indicating a migration has not yet started

statusInProgress.description: The status indicating a migration is currently in progress

statusSuccess.description: The status indicating a migration has completed successfully

statusFailure.description: The status indicating a migration has completed but failed
